title: HashiRWA Issuer Dataset Schema
description: Defines structure for issuer onboarding records for HashiRWA platform (Milestone 1 and beyond).

issuer_id.description: Unique ID for the issuer entry.

product_name.description: Primary product name or asset listing.

category.description: Product or asset category (e.g. Agriculture, Food, Beverage).

certificate_type.description: Certification or verification type (e.g. GAP, HACCP, ISO).

certificate_id.description: Certificate number or unique ID if available.

region.description: Geographical region or prefecture of the issuer.

website_or_qr.description: Official website or QR verification link.

event_source.description: Reference for where this data was introduced (e.g. seed, onboarding form, manual entry).

verified_by.description: Entity or reviewer verifying this issuerâ€™s information.

data_source.description: Defines data origin: mock (test), pilot (limited real), or production (fully verified).

is_mock.description: True if this is a mock/test entry; false for real data.

evidence_url.description: Publicly accessible proof (certificate, registry, or screenshot).

privacy_level.description: Controls visibility in the UI and export layers.
